snippet: A sergeant from Fort Hood, Tex., is under investigation for allegations of pandering, abusive sexual contact, assault and maltreatment of subordinates, Pentagon officials said
abstract: Unnamed Army sergeant who served as sexual assault prevention and response coordinator at Fort Hood, Tx, is under investigation for allegations of pandering, abusive sexual contact, assault and maltreatment of subordinates.
lead_paragraph: A sergeant from Fort Hood, Tex., is under investigation for allegations of pandering, abusive sexual contact, assault and maltreatment of subordinates, Pentagon officials said

headline.seo: Army Sergeant Accused of Sexual Abuse
